channel.title: English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in English on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: Nylas Partners with Seasalt.ai to Help Asia Pacific and Japanese Organizations Unlock Conversational AI and Developer Productivity
item.description: PALO ALTO – March 27, 2024 – Nylas, the state-of-the-art communications platform giving developers universal access to email, calendar, and contacts providers through a single API integration, today announced a strategic partnership with Seasalt.ai, a leader in cloud communications AI technologies. Under the terms of the partnership, multinational companies harnessing both Nylas and Seasalt.ai can seamlessly build email and scheduling features into their applications and contact centers without needing to commit significant time and resources. Additionally, customers will have access to dynamic AI capabilities to enhance customer conversations and satisfaction.

item.title: Seasalt.ai Becomes a Reseller of Twilio Flex
item.description: SEATTLE – Seasalt.ai signed an agreement with Twilio to resell Twilio Flex, enabling them to directly sell Twilio Flex to end customers in China, Hong Kong and Taiwan. This announcement strengthens the existing strategic relationship between the two companies and amplifies their combined vision to enhance customer experience using conversational AI in contact centers.

item.title: No Jitter Interviews Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao
item.description: No Jitter recently asked Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao to talk about Seasalt.ai’s speech recognition technology and how it is used in the company’s SeaVoice and SeaX platforms. The article also discusses how Seasalt.ai is focusing on the underserved Southeast Asian market.

item.title: Twilio and Seasalt.ai Expand Partnership in Asia Pacific & Japan to Build Multi-Country Cloud Contact Centers
item.description: Twilio and Seasalt.ai announce the expansion of their partnership to Asia Pacific and Japan. Seasalt.ai builds on the Twilio customer engagement platform with SeaX, a quick deployment bundle the streamlines the rollout of complete multi-country cloud contact centers.
